tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ComplianceReports (
 report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 report_name VARCHAR(255),
 query_used TEXT,
 compliance_score INT
)

CREATE TABLE compliance_status (
    status_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    report_id INT NOT NULL,
    reg_id INT NOT NULL,
    query_id INT NOT NULL,
    compliance BOOLEAN
);
